name: Blade Gunner
description:
Blade Gunner is a Gauntlet clone with a Cyberpunk theme. Hop in as one of three playable characters, and use their indiviual abilities against various enemies with unique behaviour. Traverse gloomy, neon-lit alleys, damp sewers, and High-Tech facilities, as you make your way to the central core of an AI gone rogue.

External Tools and Assets

  • Visual Studio Community 2019: https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/de/
  • Github für Visual Studio: https://visualstudio.github.com/
  • CMake: https://cmake.org/
  • Raylib 3.1: https://www.raylib.com/

  • Tiled Map Editor: https://www.mapeditor.org/
  • Gimp: https://www.gimp.org/
  • Adobe Photoshop: https://www.adobe.com

  • Sketchup Make 2017: https://www.sketchup.com/
  • Audacity: https://www.audacityteam.org/ 
  • Pathfinding Algorithmus: A* Algorithm by daancode (modifiziert) https://github.com/daancode/a-star
